Description

Assists in constructing queries for Google Document List documents

Zend_Gdata_Docs_Query Provides a fluent interface

setTitle( string   $value, ) : Zend_Gdata_Docs_Query

Description

Sets the title attribute for this query. The title parameter is used to restrict the results to documents whose titles either contain or completely match the title.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string |

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Docs_Query Provides a fluent interface

setTitleExact( boolean   $value, ) : Zend_Gdata_Docs_Query

Description

Sets the title-exact attribute for this query.

If title-exact is set to true, the title query parameter will be used in an exact match. Only documents with a title identical to the title parameter will be returned.


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value boolean | Use either true or false

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Docs_Query Provides a fluent interface

setVisibility(   $value, ) : Zend_Gdata_Docs_Query

Description

Sets the visibility for this query. Common values for visibility include 'private'.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value n/a

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Docs_Query Provides a fluent interface

Properties

$_defaultFeedUri, $_projection, $_visibility,

  protected  $_defaultFeedUri = self

The generic base URL used by some inherited methodsstring


  protected  $_projection = full

The projection determines how much detail should be given in the result of the query. Full is the only valid projection for the documents list.string


  protected  $_visibility = private

The visibility to be used when querying for the feed. A request for a feed with private visbility requires the user to be authenricated.string
<p>Private is the only avilable visibility for the documents list.</p>

Constants

string  DOCUMENTS_LIST_FEED_URI = https://docs.google.com/feeds/documents

The base URL for retrieving a document list
